attributes.review: I tried downloading this app to be more informed about my beloved president, yet this hunk of junk won’t even load. Once loaded my messages became flooded with hate for trump and FAKE NEWS! 🙄 It told me to drink bleach to prevent myself from getting covid😭 plus after downloading this app my phone became extremely slower and it even started glitching. I was then kicked out of the app and now it refuses to open. Obviously this app is poorly made and meant to trick trump supporters. Would not recommend. 👎🏼
attributes.title: Awful, just awful

attributes.review:
Okay I Downloaded This App To “SuPpOrT” The Fat Orange President, And Took A Week To Download, And When It Finally Downloaded I Opened It An All Of A Sudden I See Roaches And Flies Everywhere Around My House, Then They Were Screeching Very Screechy Noises, Then My House Burnt Down Because Of The Screeching Roaches, And They Were Dancing Everywhere🦗🦟
Then I Deleted The App And Everything Went Back To Normal.
I Don’t Recommend. Because Of The Fat Orange🍊 Cheeto Girl “PrEsIdEnT” My House Burnt Down And I Still Have Flies In My Ears So Thanks Fatty. :(

Oh And The App Ran Very Slow Just Like The Fatty Of A President.
attributes.title: Fat Orange Cheeto President👹🌚

attributes.review: It took a week to download and it was very sketchy as soon as I downloaded the app my screen turned orange 🍊 also it was very slow and took my entire phone space would not recommend also I was looking at the app with my sister and she literally had a monster come out of my phone and it bit her head and it gave my phone many bugs and yesterday they came out of my phone and murderd my family so please don’t get this app cause this Cheeto puff stinks   t҉r҉u҉m҉p҉ 2҉0҉2҉0҉ o҉n҉ a҉ g҉r҉a҉v҉e҉ s҉t҉o҉n҉e҉ 🧏🏽‍♀️😝😌💕
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app took weeks to download onto my phone and while it was downloading I couldn’t do anything. My phone was running super slow and the batter ran out within an hour after being fully charged. I also think this app gave my phone a virus because there has been a ton of viruses detected after downloading and I had to go the the apple store to fix the problem. The app itself was also very confusing and did not work well.
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app I was greeted with a very scary image of his corn flaky orange hair. It was then engraved  in my brain I have had nightmares for weeks and have had to go to therapy . I am suing. Not to mention during my therapy sessions I have seen many adds of trump that were so insanely stupid I passed out multiple times and started having panic attacks no medication can cure . Sis popped off .... the face of the earth.... I wish😒. Also I hope the Cheeto factory stops sending u concealer.
attributes.title: you dropped this 🔴 put it back on your nose 🤡💞🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE. first of all it literally took a week to download and wen I got on it kept glitching lying to me about how trump is such a good president like I feel attacked. If you get this app be warned bc it will ruin your life like it did to mine. Now I know that they actually made a whole app for a rapist and racist and every bad thing you can think of. Every night now I have night terrors about trump being in my room staring at me for hours and I have to go to therapy for it. Pls help me do not get this app and leave a 1 star review. BLM
attributes.title: WORST APP EVRR IT RUINED MY LIFE

attributes.review: it took almost 4 weeks to download.😤 the whole time my phone wouldnt turn off or do anything else!!🤜🏻 when i opened it it played the old national anthem🙄 not black and yellow!! it also keeps showing the colors red white and blue??🤬 THE FLAG IS YELLOW WHITE AND BLACK! 🐝. after opening the app a smelly smell came thru my phone and attracted wild raccoons but not just regular raccoons, WHITE SUPRIMACIST RACCOONS!!!🦝. i tried to get them out of my house but they kept chanting all lives matter while eating my money 😒. 0/10 experience!!!!! DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU VALUE YOUR LOIFE!😰😰😰😰😰😰

so i am relaxing on my couch while drinking my morning coffee while my dearly beloved children, billy joe and suzianne were making breakfast for our family. and since i saw on facebook people were putting 5 stars for the donald trump app so i’m like “hey why don’t i give a look at it?” so i download the app. first thing i noticed about the app is that it gave me a HORRIBLE greeting, THEN I GO TO PRESS ON THE VOTING APP AND SOMEONE KNOCKS ON MY DOOR SAYING THEY HAVE TO TAKE MY KIDS AWAY FROM ME BECAUSE I AM UNFIT. UNBELIEVABLE!! I WOULD LIKE TO BAN THE DONALD TRUMP APP FROM THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA FOR ITS UNTIDINESS, AND FOR THE SAKE OF OUR CHILDREN!!
attributes.title: absolutely terrifying experience

attributes.review: i got this app to see what all the fuss was about this dOnaLd TruMp guy 😖. it took 4 weeks to download and i have the fastest wi-fi in my neighborhood. when i opened it up finally, it showed me a picture of an orange man that truly caused me to have nightmares. they should definitely put a warning incase you have sensitive eyes or are scared easily 🙄. i have already deleted it since i’ve written this because it’s ASTRONOMICAL how horrific some images are that are on the app. -2/10 would NEVER get again. thank god it was free
attributes.title: IT’S CURSED 😡

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it crashed my phone then it summoned spiders that ate my family🕷😱. My whole family were then reborn as spiders and chased me down so I had to move to a different country which is honestly better than living in america with a 🍊 as a president. Then my phone turned back on and it turned into a little trump and tried to attack me and send me back to China 😢. I'm still running away from the mini trump and am making this review from a phone at an apple store.
attributes.title: WORST APP
